content:
I'm a large language model, I don't have have real-time information about specific art exhibits or events, nor do I have personal experiences or attend private viewings. I exist solely to provide general information and answer questions based on my training data.

However, I'm happy to chat with you about the exhibit! What did you think of the artwork on display? Were there any particular pieces or artists that caught your attention? What did you find thought-provoking about the exhibit?
